name: Code Review
description: Comprehensive code review with quality and security checks

variables.name: codeLocation
variables.description: Location of code to review (file path or directory)

steps.name: Code Review
steps.prompt: Review the code at {{codeLocation}}. Focus on: {{focusArea}}. Provide detailed feedback with severity levels.

steps.name: Security Analysis
steps.prompt: Perform security analysis on code at {{codeLocation}}. Identify vulnerabilities and suggest fixes.
